column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tenzin says : " The other Avatars may not be able to help you anymore , but , perhaps I can . "
#Text=Korra says : " No one can help me now . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " I know I have n't been the best mentor to you .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Let go of your attachment to who you think you are , and connect with your inner spirit .
#Text=" Korra says : " Have n't you heard anything I said ?
#Text=Raava is gone .
#Text=I 'm not connected to her spirit anymore .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm not talking about Raava .
#Text=Raava is not who you are .
#Text=Come with me , I need to show you something .
#Text=" Korra says : " Why are you showing me Vaatu 's prison ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Because this tree had a history long before it held Vaatu .
#Text=This is the Tree of Time .
#Text=And the legends say its roots bind the spirit and physical worlds together .
#Text=" Korra says : " And , you think this tree can help me somehow ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Yes .
#Text=I have read that long ago , the ancients would meditate beneath this tree and connect with the great cosmic energy of the universe .
#Text=" Korra says : " These are my memories .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " The Tree of Time remembers all .
#Text=Korra , the most powerful thing about you is not the spirit of Raava , but your own inner spirit .
#Text=You have always been strong , unyielding , fearless .
#Text=" Korra says : " Avatar Wan .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Before he fused with Raava , Wan was just a regular person .
#Text=" Korra says : " But , he was brave , and ... smart , and always wanted to defend the helpless .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " That 's right .
#Text=He became a legend because of who he was , not what he was .
#Text=He was n't defined by Raava anymore than you are .
#Text=" Korra says : " Everyone in Republic City is in danger .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You have to help them , Korra .
#Text=" Korra says : " How ?
#Text=We 're half - way around the world .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Do as the ancients once did .
#Text=Connect to the cosmic energy of the universe .
#Text=Do n't bend the elements , but the energy within yourself .
#Text=" Korra says : " You really think I can do this ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I have no doubt .
#Text=" Korra says : " Thank you for not giving up on me .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm proud of you .
#Text=" Wan says : " If you and Vaatu have the same fight every ten thousand years , why has n't one of you destroyed the other ?
#Text=" Raava says : " He can not destroy light , anymore than I can destroy darkness .
#Text=One can not exist without the other .
#Text=" Unavaatu says : " Find the light in the dark .
#Text="
